name.zh: 拉链顶部多用途收纳袋（多颜色）

description.en: A compact zip-top utility pouch designed for everyday organization. Features a structured body, smooth top zipper, and a roomy interior for stationery, chargers, cosmetics, or travel essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, logo patch, lining, inner pockets, zipper (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便实用的拉链顶部收纳袋，包型挺括，开合顺畅，内部空间适合收纳文具、充电线材、化妆品或旅行随身小物。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、内袋结构、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Top zipper, standard or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：顶部拉链（常规或可选 YKK）
五金：拉链头/小配件（可定制）

en.Use Case: Tech pouch, cosmetics pouch, travel organizer, stationery bag
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–28cm × 高 12–18cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 数码收纳/化妆包/旅行收纳/文具袋
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
